title: Hear me out with this skin idea GD: Naptime Lulu
body:
(Or Slumber Party Lulu)

She's wearing a nightgown, fuzzy bunny slippers, and one of those old sand man hats.
Pix is just wearing the hat and gown (OR MAYBE PIX IS A SHEEP!).

Her Q is a shooting star
Her W turns people into sheep and sprays a trail of sand behind her if used on herself.
Her E is a swirling sand shield
Her R makes them big and the Milky Way swirls beneath them.

Someone please make me beautiful art.

http://puu.sh/dppkr/340b985de3.jpg
http://puu.sh/doeCu/bfb1f706ea.jpg
http://puu.sh/doeDP/e004202580.jpg
Thanks Kissed, Legal Loli, & Lenadha
